title: Alexandria/Kapisa
description: "Alexandria in the Caucasus", an Achaemenid town re-established by Alexander the Great at modern Charikar, near Bagram in Afghanistan.

properties.description: Coordinates after Jona Lendering at Livius.org, verified in Google Earth in July 2012. Dates after M.U. Erdosy in BAtlas.
properties.title: Centerpoint of visible remains of Alexandria/Kapisa
